item.title: The Daily Edit: Richard Johnson Ice Huts / Modern Farmer
item.description:
The Daily Edit: Richard Johnson Ice Huts / Modern Farmer

An interview with Toronto photographer Richard Johnson about his ongoing project to photograph ice fishing huts across Canada.

Interview with Toronto photographer Richard Johnson about his ongoing project to photograph ice fishing huts across Canada.

item.title: The Blacksmiths 2
item.description:
The Blacksmiths 2

A personal photography project about blacksmiths and their craft.

item.title: The Blacksmiths
item.description:
The Blacksmiths

A personal photography project about blacksmiths and their craft.

My name is Dan Bannister and I’m a commercial photographer based in Toronto, Canada. My day to day photography work is mostly advertising and fashion for retail brands but I like to add variety to my photography and exercise my creative muscles by pursuing personal projects alongside my commercial work as much as I can.

item.title: Pontypool photographer shoots amazing image
item.description:
Pontypool photographer shoots amazing image

A Pontypool native who has photographed Canada's far north for the better part of a decade is aiming to capitalize on a photo he took that went viral late last month, generating an explosion of media attention.

item.title: Oh, Saskatchewan you are so pretty
item.description:
Oh, Saskatchewan you are so pretty

The beauty of our home is boundless. This fact has been extensively documented by amateur and professional photographers, videographers and astrophotographers alike. Here are some of the best, latest photographs that Saskatchewan people have shared with us during the first week of 2016!

item.title: We're on The Grid!
item.description:
We're on The Grid!

It's taken more than a year, but I just got access to The Grid Beta! I've read a lot of mixed reviews from beta users, so I'm keeping my expectations in check, but I'm still very excited to see what it can do!
